meanings.definition: A unit of electrical charge equal to the charge carried by one electron.
meanings.sent1: I measured the electros in the circuit to ensure it was safe.
meanings.sent2: The electros in the battery power our devices.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole all the electros from the power lines!
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up the room like a surge of electros.
meanings.sent5: The electros danced along the wires, bringing light to the dark night.

meanings.definition: A prefix meaning relating to electricity or electrical equipment.
meanings.sent1: The electrician used electroscopic tools to fix the wiring.
meanings.sent2: The electrosensitive equipment needed careful handling.
meanings.sent3: The party was so electrifying, it felt like a room full of electros!
meanings.sent4: His ideas sparked an electros of creativity in the team.
meanings.sent5: The electrosafety measures prevented any accidents in the lab.
